name: Custom Thank You Page For Woocommerce
author: Daniel Villalba

sections.description:
This is a modification of the CloudSkyrocket.com plugin. It is very simple and strait forward Plugin for Woocommerce Shop Owners that would like to send their users to a thank you page that is different from the default Woocommece order received page.

You can set the thank you page on a product by product basis. When the Plugin is installed you will see a new field under the General tab on each Product Edit Screen. This is where you can specify where you would like customers directed to after the purchase of that product.

This is a simple Plugin but it opens up your Woocommerce Shop to a whole range of available functionality.

Activation Steps

  1. Navigate to any product edit screen and go down to the General tab.== Installation ==

Upload Manually

  1. Download and unzip the plugin.
  2. Upload the folder directory to /wp-content/plugins/.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Navigate to any product edit screen and go down to the General tab.

Install Via Admin Area

  1. In the admin area go to Plugins > Add New and search for “Local SEO and Business Listings”
  2. Click install and then click activate
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Navigate to any product edit screen and go down to the General tab.
  5. Click on the link to generate your API key to enable the functionality of the Plugin.
  6. Supply your credentials and update the product.

Please Note: Make sure you have NO spaces before or after the API key or Email Address when inputting them into the fields.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Adaptation to WP 4.8+ and API conection disabled 1.0 =
  • Initial launch of the plugin.
